segments.text: Peter , it's time to eat breakfast .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright , you'd better hurry , your bus is coming .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mom ~ the toothpaste dropped on my shorts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , dear , go get another pair . I'll help you change your shorts .
segments.speaker: S1
